item.title: Malvadine
item.description: Malvadine is an Elite Warrior of the Mipedian Tribe.

item.description: Zhade is a Mipedian Stalker and an infiltrator agent of his Tribe

item.title: Dibanni
item.description: I can only open the door to understanding the true mysteries of Mugic. I can force no one to walk through it Dibanni Rarity Energy Mugicians Rare 30 2         55 35 70 55 Elements

item.description: Stop this madness! Haven't you learned from your mistakes?! Sobtjek Rarity Energy Mugicians Common 45 2         30 30 60 40 Elements

item.title: Fivarth
item.description: Our so-called 'leaders' have failed us. Now we must control our own destiny! Fivarth Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 15 2         15 15 15 15 Elements

item.title: Ghatup
item.description: Travelling far beyond the desert, Ghatup has seen many sights, including those he wishes he never had Rarity Energy Mugicians Uncommon 40 2         60 20 65 60 Elements

item.title: Malvadine, The King's Herald
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Ultra Rare 65 1         85 50 45 100 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 8'7"Weight 388 lbsEyes Yellowish-green & Black Skin Reddish-orange Loyalty Mipedians Preferred Locations Kaizeph, the City of Elements   We shall claim this city for Mipedim as we await King Theb-saar's return!

item.title: Prince Mudeenu

item.title: Ubliqun
item.description: When this unseen warrior takes to the air, look out. But you'll see nothing... until it's too late! Rarity Energy Mugicians Rare 35 2         35 45 60 60 Elements

item.title: Vinta
item.description: Many trespassers have felt the breath of Vinta as they breached the Mipedim Oasis. But they have felt it too late Rarity Energy Mugicians Uncommon 35 2         40 60 35 40 Elements

item.title: Zhade, Dig Site Defender
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Common 45 1         65 45 30 95 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 6'Weight 215 lbsEyes Medium-Blue Skin Golden Brown (skin) Fire-brick Red (frill) Goldenrod Flower Yellow (horns) Loyalty Mipedians   Zhade makes sure that those spies unfortunate enough to learn what was unearthed never report their findings
